00049 void Library::addEntry(wxString reference, wxInputStream& inStream, bool newCat)
00050 {
00051         // empty xml document
00052         wxXmlDocument xml;
00053 
00054         // pointer to wxZipEntry
00055         wxZipEntry* entry;
00056 
00057         // input file to open library
00058         std::auto_ptr<wxFFileInputStream> inFile(new wxFFileInputStream(m_fileName.GetFullPath()));
00059 
00060         // temp output file to store new lib
00061         wxTempFileOutputStream outFile(m_fileName.GetFullPath());
00062 
00063         // zip input stream
00064         wxZipInputStream inzip(*inFile);
00065 
00066         // zip output stream
00067         wxZipOutputStream outzip(outFile);
00068 
00069         // copy meta data
00070         outzip.CopyArchiveMetaData(inzip);
00071 
00072         // get first entry of inzip
00073         entry = inzip.GetNextEntry();
00074 
00075         // copy all entries
00076         while (entry)
00077         {
00078                 // copy all entries except the old xml
00079                 if (entry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.xml")))
00080                 {
00081                         //open entry
00082                         inzip.OpenEntry(*entry);
00083 
00084                         // new xml
00085                         xml.Load(inzip);
00086 
00087                         // close entry
00088                         inzip.CloseEntry();
00089 
00090                         // do not copy entry, set next entry
00091                         entry = inzip.GetNextEntry();
00092 
00093                         // add entry into xml
00094                         addXmlEntry(xml, outzip, newCat);
00095                 }
00096 
00097                 // if there are more than xml, copy
00098                 if (inzip.GetTotalEntries() > 1)
00099                 {
00100                         // copy all entries
00101                         outzip.CopyEntry(entry, inzip);
00102                 }
00103 
00104                 // get next entry
00105                 entry = inzip.GetNextEntry();
00106         }
00107 
00108         // new entry
00109         outzip.PutNextEntry(reference);
00110 
00111         // copy data
00112         inStream.Read(outzip);
00113 
00114         // close entry
00115         outzip.CloseEntry();
00116 
00117         // close outzip
00118         outzip.Close();
00119 
00120         // close file
00121         inFile.reset();
00122 
00123         // generate new file
00124         outFile.Commit();
00125 }

00199 wxMemoryOutputStream* Library::getEntryData(wxString reference)
00200 {
00201         // wxZipEntry pointer
00202         wxZipEntry* entry;
00203 
00204         // fileinput
00205         wxFFileInputStream inFile(m_fileName.GetFullPath());
00206 
00207         // zip input
00208         wxZipInputStream inZip(inFile);
00209 
00210         // memoryoutputstream to return
00211         wxMemoryOutputStream* memOut = new wxMemoryOutputStream;
00212 
00213         // get first entry
00214         entry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00215 
00216         // walk through all entries
00217         while (entry)
00218         {
00219                 // check if entry found
00220                 if (entry->GetName() == reference)
00221                 {
00222                         // open entry
00223                         inZip.OpenEntry(*entry);
00224 
00225                         // copy data into memOut
00226                         inZip.Read(*memOut);
00227 
00228                         // close entry
00229                         inZip.CloseEntry();
00230 
00231                         // found
00232                         break;
00233                 }
00234 
00235                 // get next entry
00236                 entry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00237         }
00238 
00239         return memOut;
00240 }

00372 unsigned int Library::getParentId(wxString name)
00373 {
00374         // tmp int
00375         unsigned int parentId;
00376 
00377         // iterator
00378         std::vector<LibraryCategory>::iterator it;
00379 
00380         // walk through all entrys, look for name
00381         for (it = m_ptrCategories->begin(); it != m_ptrCategories->end(); it++)
00382         {
00383                 if (it->getName() == name)
00384                 {
00385                         parentId = it->getParentId();
00386                 }
00387         }
00388 
00389         return parentId;
00390 }

00392 void Library::openLibrary()
00393 {
00394         // string to store groupname
00395         wxString Name;
00396 
00397         // check if file exist
00398         if (!wxFileExists(m_fileName.GetFullPath()))
00399         {
00400                 // create new empty library
00401                 createEmptyLibrary();
00402         }
00403 
00404         // get library.gnr as FileInputStream
00405         wxFFileInputStream inFile(m_fileName.GetFullPath());
00406 
00407         // get File as wxZipInputStream
00408         wxZipInputStream inZip(inFile);
00409 
00410         // m_zipEntry to first entry
00411         wxZipEntry* zipEntry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00412 
00413         // walk through all entrys and look for an xml file
00414         while (zipEntry)
00415         {
00416                 // lookfor *.xml
00417                 if (zipEntry->GetName().Matches(wxT("*.xml")));
00418                 {
00419                         // open entry
00420                         inZip.OpenEntry(*zipEntry);
00421 
00422                         // load xml
00423                         LoadXml(inZip);
00424 
00425                         // close entry
00426                         inZip.CloseEntry();
00427 
00428                         //entry found
00429                         break;
00430                 }
00431 
00432                 // get next Entry
00433                 zipEntry = inZip.GetNextEntry();
00434         }
00435 }

00437 void Library::createEmptyLibrary()
00438 {
00439         // create outputstream
00440         wxFFileOutputStream outFile(m_fileName.GetFullPath());
00441 
00442         // create zipoutputstream
00443         wxZipOutputStream outZip(outFile);
00444 
00445         // create new empty xml document
00446         wxXmlDocument xml;
00447 
00448         // set xml version
00449         xml.SetVersion(wxT("1.0"));
00450 
00451         // set file encoding
00452         xml.SetFileEncoding(wxT("utf-8"));
00453 
00454         // create root
00455         wxXmlNode* root = new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("gnr"));
00456 
00457         // set root
00458         xml.SetRoot(root);
00459 
00460         // create entries
00461         wxXmlNode* node = new wxXmlNode(root, wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("entries"));
00462 
00463         // create categoreis
00464         node = new wxXmlNode(root, wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("categories"));
00465 
00466         // new zipEntry
00467         outZip.PutNextEntry(wxT("library.xml"));
00468 
00469         // copy data into entry
00470         xml.Save(outZip);
00471 
00472         // close entry
00473         outZip.CloseEntry();
00474 
00475         // close zipStream
00476         outZip.Close();
00477 
00478         // close file
00479         outFile.Close();
00480 }
00481 
00482 void Library::LoadXml(wxInputStream& inStream)
00483 {
00484         // store name
00485         wxString name;
00486 
00487         // store reference
00488         wxString reference;
00489 
00490         // store id
00491         unsigned int categoryId = 1;
00492 
00493         // create xml document of m_inZip
00494         wxXmlDocument xml(inStream);
00495 
00496         // create pointer to node
00497         wxXmlNode* node;
00498 
00499         // create pointer to prop
00500         wxXmlProperty* prop;
00501 
00502         // node to root
00503         node = xml.GetRoot();
00504 
00505         // node to categories
00506         node = node->GetChildren();
00507 
00508         if (node->GetChildren() != NULL)
00509         {
00510                 // node to first category
00511                 node = node->GetChildren();
00512 
00513                 // set parentId to 0
00514                 m_parentId = 0;
00515 
00516                 // walk through all next nodes
00517                 while (node)
00518                 {
00519                         // walk through all children
00520                         while (node)
00521                         {
00522                                 // prop to name
00523                                 prop = node->GetProperties();
00524 
00525                                 // get value of name
00526                                 name = prop->GetValue();
00527 
00528                                 // prop to categoryid
00529                                 prop = prop->GetNext();
00530 
00531                                 // get value of categoryId
00532                                 categoryId = wxAtoi(prop->GetValue());
00533 
00534                                 // add new category
00535                                 addCategory(name, categoryId, m_parentId);
00536 
00537                                 // check if there are children
00538                                 if (node->GetChildren() != NULL)
00539                                 {
00540                                         // set new parentId
00541                                         m_parentId = categoryId;
00542 
00543                                         // set to next children
00544                                         node = node->GetChildren();
00545                                 }
00546 
00547                                 // another children
00548                                 else if (node->GetNext() != NULL)
00549                                 {
00550                                         // node to next
00551                                         node = node->GetNext();
00552                                 }
00553                                 // no children anymore
00554                                 else
00555                                 {
00556                                         // set node to parent
00557                                         node = node->GetParent();
00558 
00559                                         // check if categories
00560                                         if (node->GetProperties())
00561                                         {
00562                                                 // get first property
00563                                                 prop = node->GetProperties();
00564 
00565                                                 // get value
00566                                                 name = prop->GetValue();
00567 
00568                                                 // get parentId
00569                                                 m_parentId = getParentId(name);
00570                                         }
00571                                         // if not possible, parent => 0
00572                                         else
00573                                         {
00574                                                 m_parentId = 0;
00575                                         }
00576 
00577                                         // leave loop
00578                                         break;
00579                                 }
00580                         }
00581 
00582                         // check if next exist
00583                         if (node->GetNext() != NULL)
00584                         {
00585                                 // exist, set node to next
00586                                 node = node->GetNext();
00587 
00588                                 // check if finisched with categories
00589                                 if (node->GetName() == wxT("entries"))
00590                                 {
00591                                         // leave loop
00592                                         break;
00593                                 }
00594                         }
00595                         // next does not exist
00596                         else
00597                         {
00598                                 // set node to parent
00599                                 node = node->GetParent();
00600 
00601                                 // get first property
00602                                 prop = node->GetProperties();
00603 
00604                                 // get value
00605                                 name = prop->GetValue();
00606 
00607                                 // get parentId
00608                                 m_parentId = getParentId(name);
00609 
00610                                 // set node to next
00611                                 node = node->GetNext();
00612                         }
00613                 }
00614         }
00615 
00616         // node to first entry
00617         node = node->GetChildren();
00618 
00619         // walk through all entries
00620         while (node)
00621         {
00622                 // prop to name
00623                 prop = node->GetProperties();
00624 
00625                 // get name
00626                 name = prop->GetValue();
00627 
00628                 // prop to reference
00629                 prop = prop->GetNext();
00630 
00631                 // get reference
00632                 reference = prop->GetValue();
00633 
00634                 // prop to categoryid
00635                 prop = prop->GetNext();
00636 
00637                 // get categoryid
00638                 categoryId = wxAtoi(prop->GetValue());
00639 
00640                 // add new entry
00641                 addEntry(name, reference, categoryId);
00642 
00643                 // check if next node exist
00644                 if (node->GetNext())
00645                 {
00646                         // everything ok, next exist
00647                         node = node->GetNext();
00648                 }
00649                 // no next node
00650                 else
00651                 {
00652                         // no next node, jump out
00653                         break;
00654                 }
00655         }
00656 }

00658 void Library::addCategory(wxString& name, unsigned int& categoryId, unsigned int& parentId)

00669 void Library::addXmlEntry(wxXmlDocument& xml, wxZipOutputStream& out, bool newCat)
00670 {
00671         // node pointer
00672         wxXmlNode* node;
00673 
00674         // node to root
00675         node = xml.GetRoot();
00676 
00677         // node to categories
00678         node = node->GetChildren();
00679 
00680         // if true => new category
00681         if (newCat)
00682         {
00683                 // new node
00684                 wxXmlNode* newCatChild = new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("category"));
00685 
00686                 // add attributes
00687                 newCatChild->AddProperty(wxT("name"), m_ptrCategories->back().getName());
00688                 wxString cat, parent;
00689                 cat << m_ptrCategories->back().getCategoryId();
00690                 parent << m_ptrCategories->back().getParentId();
00691                 newCatChild->AddProperty(wxT("categoryId"), cat);
00692                 newCatChild->AddProperty(wxT("parentId"), parent);
00693 
00694                 // add child
00695                 node->AddChild(newCatChild);
00696         }
00697 
00698         // node to entries
00699         node = node->GetNext();
00700 
00701         // new node
00702         wxXmlNode* newChild = new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("entry"));
00703 
00704         // add attributes
00705         newChild->AddProperty(wxT("name"), m_ptrEntries->back().getName());
00706         newChild->AddProperty(wxT("reference"), m_ptrEntries->back().getReference());
00707         wxString tmp;
00708         tmp << m_ptrEntries->back().getCategoryId();
00709         newChild->AddProperty(wxT("categoryId"), tmp);
00710 
00711         // add child
00712         node->AddChild(newChild);
00713 
00714         // new zipEntry
00715         out.PutNextEntry(wxT("library.xml"));
00716 
00717         // copy data into entry
00718         xml.Save(out);
00719 
00720         // close entry
00721         out.CloseEntry();
00722 }
00723 
00724 void Library::deleteXmlEntry(wxXmlDocument& xml, wxZipOutputStream& out, wxString& reference)
00725 {
00726         // node pointer
00727         wxXmlNode* node;
00728 
00729         // node pointer
00730         wxXmlNode* delNode;
00731 
00732         // property pointer
00733         wxXmlProperty* prop;
00734 
00735         // node to root
00736         node = xml.GetRoot();
00737 
00738         // node to categories
00739         node = node->GetChildren();
00740 
00741         // node to entries
00742         node = node->GetNext();
00743 
00744         // node to first entry
00745         node = node->GetChildren();
00746 
00747         // walk through all children
00748         while (node)
00749         {
00750                 // prop to name
00751                 prop = node->GetProperties();
00752 
00753                 // prop to ref
00754                 prop = prop->GetNext();
00755 
00756                 // check if found
00757                 if (prop->GetValue() == reference)
00758                 {
00759                         // set delNode to node
00760                         delNode = node;
00761 
00762                         // found
00763                         break;
00764                 }
00765         }
00766 
00767         // node to parent
00768         node = node->GetParent();
00769 
00770         // delete childen of node
00771         node->RemoveChild(delNode);
00772 
00773         // new zipEntry
00774         out.PutNextEntry(wxT("library.xml"));
00775 
00776         // copy data into entry
00777         xml.Save(out);
00778 
00779         // close entry
00780         out.CloseEntry();
00781 
00782         // delete old node
00783         delete delNode;
00784 }

00786 void Library::renameXmlCategory(wxXmlDocument& xml, wxZipOutputStream& out, wxString& reference, wxString& newName)
00787 {
00788         // node pointer
00789         wxXmlNode* node;
00790 
00791         // property pointer
00792         wxXmlProperty* prop;
00793 
00794         // node to root
00795         node = xml.GetRoot();
00796 
00797         // node to categories
00798         node = node->GetChildren();
00799 
00800         // node to first category
00801         node = node->GetChildren();
00802 
00803         // walk through all next nodes
00804         while (node)
00805         {
00806                 // walk through all children
00807                 while (node)
00808                 {
00809                         // prop to name
00810                         prop = node->GetProperties();
00811 
00812                         // look if proper name
00813                         if (prop->GetValue() == reference)
00814                         {
00815                                 // set new name
00816                                 prop->SetValue(newName);
00817                         }
00818 
00819                         // check if there are children
00820                         if (node->GetChildren() != NULL)
00821                         {
00822                                 // set to next children
00823                                 node = node->GetChildren();
00824                         }
00825 
00826                         // another children
00827                         else if (node->GetNext() != NULL)
00828                         {
00829                                 // node to next
00830                                 node = node->GetNext();
00831                         }
00832                         // no children anymore
00833                         else
00834                         {
00835                                 // set node to parent
00836                                 node = node->GetParent();
00837 
00838                                 // leave loop
00839                                 break;
00840                         }
00841                 }
00842 
00843                 // check if next exist
00844                 if (node->GetNext() != NULL)
00845                 {
00846                         // exist, set node to next
00847                         node = node->GetNext();
00848 
00849                         // check if finisched with categories
00850                         if (node->GetName() == wxT("entries"))
00851                         {
00852                                 // leave loop
00853                                 break;
00854                         }
00855                 }
00856                 // next does not exist
00857                 else
00858                 {
00859                         // set node to parent
00860                         node = node->GetParent();
00861 
00862                         // set node to next
00863                         node = node->GetNext();
00864                 }
00865         }
00866 
00867         // new zipEntry
00868         out.PutNextEntry(wxT("library.xml"));
00869 
00870         // copy data into entry
00871         xml.Save(out);
00872 
00873         // close entry
00874         out.CloseEntry();
00875 }
00876 
00877 void Library::renameXmlEntry(wxXmlDocument& xml, wxZipOutputStream& out, wxString& reference, wxString& newName)
00878 {
00879         // node pointer
00880         wxXmlNode* node;
00881 
00882         // property pointer
00883         wxXmlProperty* prop;
00884 
00885         // node to root
00886         node = xml.GetRoot();
00887 
00888         // node to categories
00889         node = node->GetChildren();
00890 
00891         // node to entries
00892         node = node->GetNext();
00893 
00894         // node to first entry
00895         node = node->GetChildren();
00896 
00897         while (node)
00898         {
00899                 // prop to name
00900                 prop = node->GetProperties();
00901 
00902                 // prop to ref
00903                 prop = prop->GetNext();
00904 
00905                 // check if proper entry
00906                 if (prop->GetValue() == reference)
00907                 {
00908                         // prop toname
00909                         prop = node->GetProperties();
00910 
00911                         // set name
00912                         prop->SetValue(newName);
00913                 }
00914 
00915                 // check if there are children
00916                 if (node->GetChildren() != NULL)
00917                 {
00918                         // set to next children
00919                         node = node->GetNext();
00920                 }
00921                 else
00922                 {
00923                         break;
00924                 }
00925         }
00926 
00927         // new zipEntry
00928         out.PutNextEntry(wxT("library.xml"));
00929 
00930         // copy data into entry
00931         xml.Save(out);
00932 
00933         // close entry
00934         out.CloseEntry();
00935 }
